#USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# I wish I could sleep until Saturday morning for 2 reasons, it will be here quicker and I wouldn't be able to eat 😉😂 I can't wait to see you all and have some good food and lots of drinks 🥂🍹

#USER# It really is so sad and scary, it can happen to anyone, any age. At school my daughter saw a sixth former collapse while playing football and unfortunately he didn't make it, the paramedics weren't there in time but if CPR was administered sooner who knows 😔

I wasn't going to share but I had a close call this week, things got too much but I got talked back. I talk and am very open and we need to keep talking. Mental health affects everyone at some point but you don't have to do it alone so reach out 💙 #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #URL#

#USER# Wishing you lots of luck. The #HASHTAG# community is amazing on here. Please join in with #HASHTAG# if you can, it is every weeknight 7-8pm but just dip in as you like and there are lots of other fantastic hours on here to get involved with too 😀

I had a heart attack 5 years ago, I was 38 & had a 10 day old baby, luckily it wasn't a cardiac arrest but if not for the paramedics & my partner who called them I wouldn't be here today. Everyone should know this stuff, it matters. Every school should teach it! #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #URL#
